PatientDetails.Name: Marjorie R Ellis
HospitalCourse: Patient was transferred from Holzer with altered mental status, found to have sepsis secondary to MRDO UTI and hospital-acquired pneumonia.
Hospital course complicated by persistent acute multifactorial metabolic encephalopathy, volume overload, malnutrition, and acute respiratory failure.
Patient transitioned to DNR-CC and expired on 10/13/2024.

ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Deceased on 10/13/2024 due to sepsis and multiple organ failure.

InfectionIndicators.UnexplainedHypoxia: Respiratory rate increased to 40; required oxygen support

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Patient's condition worsened despite broad-spectrum antibiotic therapy indicative of severe sepsis.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: No blood transfusions were documented during this hospitalization.
